pr_title: Fixed issue with the unzipping the nested directories.

timeline.message: Fixed issue with the unzipping the nested directories. The issue is related to the ZIP entries are not being correctly created for the directories which doesn't include a trailing slash so it leads to ZipEntry.isDirectory() calls to always return false.

timeline.bodyText: IIUIC, git also doesn't store empty directories. If you had an empty directory in /nested, they aren't there when you check out from git.
timeline.author: viliam-durina

replies.bodyText: Nope, there wasn't an empty directory under /nested folder
replies.author: eminn

replies.bodyText: We should test empty directories though
replies.author: viliam-durina
